name: Cybersec - ftp hack
description: Try to get access on an unsecure FTP server, list all file on it and try to read some password protected PDF.

task_list.name: Brute force attack on VSFTP
task_list.description: create python script to launch bruteforce attack, from : https://www.thepythoncode.com/article/brute-force-attack-ftp-servers-using-ftplib-in-python

task_list.name: Crack pdf file
task_list.description: list and crack pdf encrypted file, from : https://www.thepythoncode.com/article/crack-pdf-file-password-in-python
